comments.body:
Please also add `backports` to the `run` *as well as* `host` requirements.
With the `backports` package we get the `backports/__init__.py` file and don't have to include this here in this package. It's important to add it to `host` as well since then `conda-build` will refrain from packaging this file. The whole deal with that is that we prevent clobbering of files from different packages, i.e., all those different `backports.*` packages providing/overriding each other's `backports/__init__.py`.
